QuestData.Title: Negotiations
QuestData.Description: $n, great job defending the Speedbarge! I've got something else that I need you to help out with.$B$BI've sent Riznek and Trackmaster Zherin northeast to negotiate with the centaur survivors. Their Splithoof Heights is dripping with oil!$B$BI figure those smelly half horses won't know what they've got and we'll get the rights to pump up that black gold for a song, but I'd feel better if you took charge of the talks.$B$BWhat do you say?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Riznek at the Splithoof Heights in Thousand Needles.
QuestData.RewardText: <Riznek gets a gleam in his eye.>$B$BI've got Trackmaster Zherin up there talking to one of their chiefs, but now that you're here, we'll have the rights to pump up their oil in no time!
